title: Coding with AI
description: Learn to build software by describing what you want in plain English. Master 'vibe coding' and context engineering to work effectively with AI coding assistants. No programming background required.
targetAudience: Curious professionals who want to build tools using AI assistants without traditional programming education
keyTakeaways: Build working software by describing what you want in plain English
Use context engineering (CLAUDE.md, rules files) to dramatically improve AI output
Debug with AI through iterative conversation, not frustration
Choose the right AI coding tool for your workflow
Know when to trust AI code and when human judgment is essential
